title: Cart Page Business Flow
description: Covers user actions on the shopping cart page including quantity adjustments, item removal, and checkout initiation.

steps.user_action: Open the cart page from header icon or post-add-to-cart
steps.expected_behavior: Cart page loads with all added products listed
Each product is shown with name, quantity, price, and total

steps.user_action: Increase/decrease product quantity and click on update button
steps.expected_behavior: Subtotal updates accordingly and total price recalculates

steps.user_action: Click remove/delete icon on a product row
steps.expected_behavior: Product is removed and cart total updates
Redirects back to the last visited category or home page
Redirects to the checkout process (guest/login path)

steps.user_action: View Sub-Total, taxes, and Flat Shipping Rate (if applicable)
steps.expected_behavior: Correctly calculated totals are shown before checkout
Discount is applied and total updates accordingly

steps.user_action: Select Country and State and Zip/Post code for to estimate shipping rate if not logged in
steps.expected_behavior: Shipping rate is estimated based on selected country, state, and zip code

steps.user_action: Verify Country and State and Zip/Post code for to estimate shipping rate if already logged in
steps.expected_behavior: Shipping rate is estimated based on user profile address if available, or prompts for new address if not set
